snippet.title: LongStory: Coming to Steam December 7th!
snippet.description:
That's right, LongStory will soon be on the Steam store, and FINALLY out on PC! (Re)Discover the queer positive romance game of your dreams on December 7th with some new features and a new mini episode :) 

LongStory is a funny dating sim about love, friendship, frozen yogurt, dance-offs, comic nerds, breakfast muffins and of course - mystery. Find more information and get hyped on our Steam page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/704010/LongStory
